alert.note: Alert for Snohomish (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued November 04 at 10:27AM PDT until November 05 at 7:16PM PDT by NWS Seattle
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Seattle WA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Washington... Skokomish River At Potlatch affecting Mason County. Stillaguamish River At Arlington affecting Snohomish County. Skykomish River Near Gold Bar affecting Snohomish County. .An atmospheric river will continue to bring heavy rainfall to the area today. This is expected to bring area rivers above flood stage. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Skykomish River Near Gold Bar. * WHEN...From this afternoon to tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...At 16.0 feet, the Skykomish River will cause minor flooding of low pasture lands and some roads along the river... including Ben Howard road...Index-Galena Rd and Tualco Loop Rd. A stage of 16 feet on the Skykomish River corresponds to a Phase 3 in the Snohomish County flood program. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:30 AM PDT Friday the stage was 7.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this afternoon to a crest of 16.9 feet late this evening. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow morning. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued by this evening at 630 PM PDT.
